OUR LIVE CHANNEL IS BROADCASTING NOW GO WATCH Request Booking When do you want to start the One-on-One broadcast? Date Time Add virtual gifts Quantity: Total Price: Note: Note:
%1$s credits will be deducted as deposit for the first 5 minutes of the broadcast. The deposit will be returned to your account if: - The broadcaster does not accept your request - The broadcaster does not show up during the booking period
Start Now %1$ss Rules: You will receive a rebate after watching a paid broadcast for a certain amount of time. You can use these credits to send gifts, pop-up messages and request talent shows. Sorry, this broadcaster does not offer a booking schedule at the moment. Notify me with SMS Mobile Number Change Add Mobile Number Country code Mobile Number United States +001 Enter your mobile number Send Verify Code Choose Country Code Verify Verify Mobile Number We have sent a code to your mobile: %1$ss Resend Broadcast Time My Bookings +%1$s-%2$s Congratulations You have already booked a One-on-One broadcast\n Please wait for the broadcaster\'s confirmation patiently. Sorry,you have made too many verification attempts. \nThis number is blocked for 24 hours,please use another mobile number. x %1$s Add another mobile number Please add a mobile number first. Enter the Verify Code here Intimacy Level %1$s and You %1$s / %2$s Intimacy Value Level %1$s 1、What is Intimacy Level? \nYour Intimacy Level represents how intimate you are with a broadcaster and is independent for each broadcaster. 2、What are the privileges for different levels? \nLevel 1: send private messages to broadcasters. \nLevel 2: unlock broadcaster\'s private photos. \nLevel 3: send advanced emoticons. \nLevel 4: send intimacy limited virtual gifts. \nLevel 5 and higher: more privileges will be available soon 3、How do I move up to the next intimacy level? \nEach gift sent goes toward moving up to the next level, and you will unlock different privileges and services. Intimacy with the broadcaster may decrease if you don\'t regularly view their One-on-One broadcasts. Are you sure to leave the broadcast room? 2-way video is billed at %1$s credit per minute.\nAre you sure to turn it on?
